faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions about our platform
faq.what_is: What is Sanaie and how does it work?
faq.what_is_answer: Sanaie is a local services marketplace that connects customers with verified service providers. Search by category or use the request page to get quotes, then book and pay securely through the platform.
faq.find_book: How do I find and book a service?
faq.find_book_answer: Browse categories or use the search bar to find services. Open a provider's profile to view ratings, past work, and prices, then choose a time and confirm the booking from the service page.
faq.providers_verified_answer: Providers go through identity and document verification before offering services. We also collect customer reviews and ratings to maintain quality and trust on the platform.
faq.payments_answer: We support secure online payments (credit/debit cards and local wallets) and may offer cash-on-delivery where applicable. All card payments are processed over encrypted connections.
faq.cancellation: What is the cancellation and refund policy?
faq.cancellation_answer: When you cancel an order, you can get a refund and keep it as credit in the app.
faq.become_provider: How can I become a service provider on Sanaie?
faq.become_provider_answer: Sign up as a provider from the 'Join as Service Provider' link, submit required documents, and complete the onboarding steps. Once verified, you can publish services and receive bookings.
faq.advertise: How do I advertise or promote my service on the site?
faq.advertise_answer: Advertisers can create promotional ads via the Ads section. Contact our sales team or use the dashboard (if available) to set up campaigns and target your audience.
faq.availability: Is Sanaie available in my city?
faq.availability_answer: Sanaie currently operates in major cities across Egypt. If your city isn't listed, submit a request through the contact form and we'll consider expanding coverage.
faq.support: How can I contact customer support?
faq.support_answer: Use the support/contact page, email us, or call the helpline listed in the footer. Provide booking or account details so we can help quickly.

mobile.download_sub: Get instant access to trusted service providers right from your phone. Book services, track orders, and manage your account on the go.

footer.privacy_content:
Terms and Conditions

• These Terms and Conditions include: (a) the General Terms of Use applicable to your use of Sanaiee technologies; and (b) specific provisions relating to Value Added Tax (VAT) in the Arab Republic of Egypt.

• Please read these Terms and Conditions carefully. They contain information about your rights, obligations, and other important details regarding your use of Sanaiee technologies.

General Terms of Use

1. Contractual Relationship

These Terms, including the General Terms of Use and the VAT provisions in Annex 1 (collectively referred to as "Terms"), govern the access or use by individuals within the Arab Republic of Egypt of the applications, websites, content, products, and services ("Services") provided by Creative Horizons Production, a private limited liability company headquartered in Egypt, Cairo, Royal Valley Mall, First Floor, Unit 11, Hadayek October – Giza Governorate – Commercial Register No. 38844.

Your access to and use of the Services constitutes your agreement to be bound by these Terms, which establishes a contractual relationship between you and Sanaiee. If you do not agree to these Terms, you may not access or use the Services. These Terms expressly supersede prior agreements or arrangements with you. Creative Horizons Production may terminate these Terms or any Services with respect to you, or generally cease offering or deny access to the Services or any part thereof, at any time and for any reason.

Supplemental terms may apply to certain Services, such as event-specific policies, promotional campaigns, or activities. Supplemental terms are disclosed in connection with the applicable Services and form part of the Terms. In the event of a conflict, the supplemental terms prevail.

Creative Horizons Production may amend the Terms from time to time. Amendments are effective upon posting by Sanaiee. Continued access or use after posting constitutes your consent to be bound by the amended Terms.

We collect and use personal data in accordance with our Privacy Policy, which is available at www.afaq-global.com. Creative Horizons Production may share necessary information (including your contact details) with insurers, claims administrators, or authorities in the event of a complaint, dispute, or incident between you and a third-party provider, if necessary to resolve the matter.

2. Services

The Services constitute a technology platform that enables users of Creative Horizons Production’s mobile applications or websites (each, an "Application") to arrange and schedule services and/or logistics with independent third-party providers, including service providers and logistics providers, under agreement with Sanaiee or its affiliates ("Third-Party Providers"). The Services are provided for your personal, non-commercial use, unless otherwise agreed in writing with Creative Horizons Production.

License

Subject to compliance with these Terms, Creative Horizons Production grants you a limited, non-exclusive, non-sublicensable, non-transferable, revocable license to: (1) access and use the Applications on your personal device solely in connection with your use of the Services; and (2) access and use any content, information, and related materials provided through the Services, solely for personal, non-commercial use. Rights not expressly granted are reserved.

Restrictions

You may not: (1) remove copyright, trademark, or proprietary notices from any portion of the Services; (2) reproduce, modify, prepare derivative works of, distribute, license, lease, sell, resell, transfer, publicly display, publicly perform, transmit, stream, or otherwise exploit the Services except as expressly permitted; (3) decompile, reverse engineer, or disassemble the Services except as allowed by law; (4) link to, mirror, or frame any portion of the Services; (5) launch or cause to launch any programs or scripts for scraping, indexing, or data mining, or otherwise unduly burden the Services; (6) attempt unauthorized access to the Services or related systems.

Provision of Services

You acknowledge that parts of the Services may be made available under different Creative Horizons Production brands or request options, and that Services may be provided by or in connection with: (1) affiliates or subsidiaries; or (2) independent third-party providers.

Third-Party Services and Content

The Services may be made available or accessed in connection with third-party services or content (including advertising) beyond Creative Horizons Production’s control. You acknowledge that different terms of use and privacy policies may apply. Creative Horizons Production does not endorse third-party services and is not liable for them. Apple, Google, Microsoft, and Blackberry, and their affiliates, may be external beneficiaries of this contract if you use the Services on their platforms, but are not parties to these Terms.

Ownership

The Services and all rights therein remain the property of Creative Horizons Production or its licensors. No rights are granted to you except the limited license described above. You may not use or reference company names, logos, product/service names, trademarks, or marks of Creative Horizons Production without permission.

3. Use of Services

User Accounts

To use most Services, you must register for and maintain an active personal user account ("Account"). You must be at least 18 years old. Registration requires personal information including your name, address, mobile number, age, and at least one valid payment method (credit card or accepted partner). You agree to maintain accurate, complete, and up-to-date information. Failure to do so may result in termination. You are responsible for all activity under your Account and must maintain confidentiality of credentials. Only one account per person is permitted unless authorized in writing.

to contact customer service call: 01111194176

User Requirements and Conduct

The Services are not available to persons under 18. You may not authorize third parties to use your Account, nor allow persons under 18 to receive services unless accompanied. You must comply with all applicable laws and use Services only for lawful purposes. Misuse, harm, or harassment is prohibited. Proof of identity may be requested, and refusal may result in denial of access.

Text Messages

By creating an Account, you agree the Services may send you informational text messages. You can opt out by emailing www.afaq-global.com with your mobile number. Opting out may impact Service use.

Promotional Codes

Creative Horizons Production may issue promotional codes subject to terms. Codes may be disabled at any time, cannot be sold or transferred, are not redeemable for cash, and may expire. Benefits gained through misuse or fraud may be withdrawn.

User Content

You may submit content (text, audio, video) such as feedback, reviews, or support requests ("User Content"). You retain ownership but grant Creative Horizons Production a perpetual, irrevocable, worldwide, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, modify, distribute, display, perform, and sublicense such content. You represent you have rights to the content and that it does not infringe third-party rights. You agree not to submit defamatory, hateful, obscene, illegal, or offensive content. Creative Horizons Production may review or remove content at its discretion.

Network Access and Devices

You are responsible for obtaining network access and compatible devices. Carrier rates may apply. Services may experience limitations inherent in internet use. Creative Horizons Production does not guarantee compatibility with all devices.

4. Payment

Use of the Services may result in charges for services or goods ("Charges"). After receiving services or goods, Creative Horizons Production will facilitate payment to the Third-Party Provider. Charges are final and non-refundable unless determined otherwise. Taxes may apply. Payment is due immediately via your chosen payment method. Promotional offers may apply for certain users. You may cancel service requests at any time, but charges may still apply if services were delivered.

5. Disclaimer; Limitation of Liability; Indemnity

Disclaimer

The Services are provided "as is" and "as available." Creative Horizons Production disclaims all implied warranties, including merchantability, fitness for purpose, and non-infringement. Sanaiee does not guarantee reliability, timeliness, quality, suitability, or availability of the Services, nor that they will be uninterrupted or error-free. You bear all risk arising from use.

Limitation of Liability

Creative Horizons Production is not liable for indirect, incidental, special, punitive, or consequential damages, including lost data or property damage. It is not liable for: (1) your use or inability to access the Services; (2) any transaction between you and a Third-Party Provider; or (3) delays due to factors beyond its control. Total liability is limited as permitted by law.

Indemnity

You agree to indemnify Sanaiee, its officers, directors, employees, and agents against claims, demands, or expenses (including legal fees) arising from: (1) your use of the Services; (2) breach of these Terms; (3) Sanaiee’s use of your User Content; or (4) your violation of rights of third parties.

6. Governing Law; Arbitration

These Terms are governed by the laws of Egypt, excluding conflicts of law. Disputes shall first be resolved through mandatory mediation under Egyptian Chamber of Commerce rules. If unresolved within 60 days, disputes will be referred to binding arbitration in Cairo under the Chamber’s arbitration rules. Arabic is the governing language. Proceedings, documents, and outcomes are confidential except as required.

7. Other Provisions

Intellectual Property Claims

Claims of infringement must be sent to Creative Horizons Production.

Notices

Notices may be sent via service-wide announcements, email, or postal mail. You may send notices to Creative Horizons Production at Royal Valley Mall, First Floor, Unit 11, Hadayek October, Giza, Egypt.

General

You may not assign or transfer these Terms without permission. Creative Horizons Production may assign them to affiliates, successors, or acquirers. No joint venture, employment, or agency relationship arises from these Terms. If any provision is found invalid, the remainder remains enforceable. These Terms supersede prior agreements.

Annex 1 — VAT Terms

1. These VAT Terms apply from issuance and remain in effect unless terminated.

2. Continued use of Sanaiee after receipt constitutes acceptance.

3. "Sanaiee" refers to Creative Horizons Production, a private LLC registered in Egypt.

VAT Compensation

Sanaiee does not guarantee recovery of VAT paid. Administrative costs may be deducted. Compensation, if any, is issued as non-transferable credit valid for one year in Egypt. Expired or closed accounts may receive compensation vouchers by email. Claims must be made within 12 months of discovery, and no later than 5 years.

Future Tax Changes

If new VAT rules are issued, Creative Horizons Production may resume VAT collection accordingly, with no retroactive compensation unless mandated.

Usage Policy

1. Sanaiee is a platform connecting users and providers, enabling livelihood opportunities.

2. User data and app information are owned solely by Creative Horizons Production. Unauthorized use is prohibited.

3. Providers are not employees of Creative Horizons Production; the company is not responsible for their actions. Official provider data may be shared with clients in cases of suspected violations.

4. Provider performance is monitored through customer ratings and reviews, which cannot be removed.

5. Materials and spare parts are purchased by clients. If a provider purchases them, responsibility remains with the client.

6. Some providers may offer workmanship warranties, limited to labor only, excluding materials.

7. Creative Horizons Production’s responsibility is limited to arranging an alternative provider.

8. Offensive language in reviews or messages is prohibited and may result in account termination.

9. Accounts with ratings below 3/5, or with repeated misconduct, may be terminated without compensation.

10. Use of the app constitutes acceptance of the Usage Policy. If you disagree, you may not use the Services.

11. Tasks without verified “start” records reduce Sanaiee’s ability to intervene in disputes.

All providers have undergone verification. Clients are advised to compare prices between multiple providers. Materials should be purchased by the client. Sanaiee filters providers to maintain quality. Clients are encouraged to leave objective reviews.

Nearby Services Section: Services are listed based on geographic proximity using Google Maps integration.
